title: Paris/1st arrondissement
name: Willi's Wine Bar
content: It's actually a restaurant and is more upscale than 'Juvéniles', serving good food and good-to-great bottles of wine with a focus on the Rhône valley, but including many from Burgundy, the Loire, as well as Italians, and "Atlantic crossing" Californians. The dinner menu by chef François Yon Great won the "Bib Gourmet 2009" award, and there are cheeses & deserts (yummy crumble)) for after. Reservation recommended.
